Kiwi.Plugins.Quests.QuestManager Class

Extends Entity
Defined in: src\Quests-1.0.0.js:15
Module: Plugins
Parent Module: Kiwi

A Kiwi Plugin GameObject that can manage a set of quests.

You can currently set two types of quests. Number quests keep track of a variable, and once it has reached it's specified objective, the quest is completed. Boolean quests keep track of a variable and once it is true or false, depending on the objective set, the quest is completed.

createQuest

(
  • id
  • typeVar
  • startValue
  • objectiveVar
  • descriptionVar
)
public

Defined in src\Quests-1.0.0.js:74

A method that creates a new quest. A quest is not started until startQuest is called, this method only creates and stores a new quest.

Parameters:

  • id String

    The name of the quest created.

  • typeVar String

    The type of quest created. 'number' or 'boolean'.

  • startValue Boolean or number

    Starting value.

  • objectiveVar Boolean or number

    Objective value. Once the current value maches, quest is completed.

  • descriptionVar String

    String describing item.

updateQuest

(
  • id
  • value
)
public

Defined in src\Quests-1.0.0.js:124

A method that updates a quest, and completes the quest automatically if the objective is met.

Parameters:

  • id String

    Name of quest to update.

  • value Boolean or number

    Value to add to the current variable, or to set to, depending on type.
